title: An unkown directx error has occured
body: This is by far the most annoying error i have ever faced in my life since it has no signs of when it will show up. It randomly appears after the champion select is done and i have to restart my computer otherwise i cant reconnect now my computer restarts slow so i can get back in a game around the 5-10 min marks but thats the samller problem here the bigger problem is that i cant find a way to fix it or just notice when it will show up. this error already got me 2 low priority Ques even tho i always reconected and sometimes even won. Somebody pls help i really dont want to get banned just cause  of some shit error

replies.body:
Hello its been 20 day and i forgot to say Thank you since even tho i didnt manage to completely remove it but you helped me reduce the appearence of this bug by a lot and it appears very rarely now.
